title: Dead End
description: It’s two weeks until Christmas and Cold Case Captain Ronan O’Mara is looking forward to spending the holiday with his daughter and husband. His plan goes awry when frantic parents rush into West Side Magick needing his help to find their kidnapped daughter, London.  Psychic Tennyson Grimm wants nothing more than to find the missing girl. He’s haunted by the first case he and Ronan ever worked together, a child kidnapping that ended with a coffin instead of a happy reunion.  With only days to go until Ronan retires from the Boston Police Department, he’s putting everything he’s got into this case. When a suspect is arrested, Ronan doubles down his efforts to find the girl and bring her home safely.  Will Tennyson and Ronan be able to find the missing girl or will this case turn into a dead end?
author: Pandora Pine
